name: Sneaking Precision

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Sneak attack class feature, Critical Focus, any critical feat, base attack bonus +9.

sections.body: Whenever you successfully sneak attack an opponent for a second time on your turn, you can spend a swift action to apply the effects of one critical feat you know to that opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your knowledge of your enemies' vulnerable spots is especially punishing.
